#************************************************#

#      Modified: 2015-05-27 17:10 +0100 UTC      #
#************************************************#

[Description]
Northem is a north-bluish dark color palette designed by Arctic Ice Studio.
Optimized for syntax highlighting and UI projects.
This is a light and more color-intensive variation.

[Variations]
Also available as:
  "Northem"         (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem)
  "Northem Dark"    (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-dark)

[Projects]
Based on this the following projects are available:

  Syntax
    - "Northem Light Atom Syntax" (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light-atom-syntax)
    - "Northem Light Eclipse"     (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light-eclipse-syntax)
    - "Northem Light gedit"       (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light-gedit)
    - "Northem Light Notepad++"   (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light-notepadplusplus)

  UI
    - "Northem Light Atom UI"     (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light-atom-ui)
    - "Northem Light GTK"         (in drafting)

Visit http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction) for more informations.

[File Formats]
Northem Light is available in many file formats:
  Non-Native
    - CSS         .css
    - LESS        .less
    - SASS        .scss
    - JSON        .json
    - XML         .xml
    - Markdown    .md
    - Java        .java
  *Native*
    - GIMP/Inkscape Palette       .gcl
    - Adobe Swatch Exchange       .ase
    - Alias/WaveFront Material    .mtl
    - Gpick Palette               .gpa

[Version]
LATEST:
  - stable:     0.0.0
  - snapshot:   /

status: Ã¬ndev

For variations or older versions check out the GitHub Repository (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light) and http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction).

[Changelog]
Check out the "CHANGELOG.md" or visit the GitHub Repository (https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light) and http://arcticicestudio.com/Northem (actually under construction).

[Development]
Please report bugs and suggestions for improvements at https://github.com/arcticicestudio/northem-light/issues.

[Recommendations]
Recommended fonts are:
  Syntax
    "Source Code Pro" (https://typekit.com/fonts/source-code-pro) (GitHub Repository: https://github.com/adobe-fonts/source-code-pro)
  *UI*
    "Roboto" (http://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Roboto) (GitHub Repository: https://github.com/google/fonts/tree/master/apache/roboto)
    "Fira Sans" (https://www.google.com/fonts/specimen/Fira+Sans) (GitHub Repository: https://github.com/google/fonts/tree/master/ofl/firasans)

[License]
Copyright (C) 2015 Arctic Ice Studio

Northem code is licensed under "GPL3" (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt).
Northem color palette itself is licensed under "CC BY-NC-SA 4.0" (http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0).

[References]
LESS:   http://lesscss.org
X11:    /usr/share/X11/rgb.txt
*/

/*
***************************
*           FONTS         *
***************************
*/
atom-workspace .horizontal .vertical {
  position: relative;
}
background-tips {
  display: block;
  pointer-events: none;
}
background-tips ul {
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  cursor: default;
}
background-tips ul li {
  opacity: 0;
  padding: 0 30px;
  transition: opacity .3s;
}
background-tips ul li .keystroke {
  border: 2px solid;
  padding: 0 0.75em;
  border-radius: 6px;
  font-family: "Helvetica Neue", Arial, sans-serif;
}
background-tips .fade-in {
  opacity: 1;
}
